title: Alternative for Norpeth
content:
Any suggestions to Norpeth?

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/norpeth/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/norpeth/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/norpeth/")

I need to find an alternative due to odd glyphs. Both desktop and webfont would be required. TIA.
author: Bokehman

comments.content:
The following Google Fonts ( [www.google.com/fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.google.com/fonts "www.google.com/fonts")) are similar to Norpeth, to greater and lesser degrees, and are available free for print and web. Perhaps one of them could work for you:

Play, by Jonas Hecksher  
Cuprum, by Jovanny Lemonad  
Maven Pro, by Joe Prince  
Exo and Exo 2, by Natanael Gama  
Armata, by Viktoriya Graboska  
Ropa Sans, by Botio Nikoltchev  
Doppio One, by Szymon Celej  
Ruda, multiple designers  
Lekton, multiple designers

Some commercial fonts that are also very close, and which come in a full family of weights:

Klavika:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/klavika/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/klavika/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/klavika/") [single-story |g| available as stylistic alternate]

Sentico Sans:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/sentico-sans-dt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/sentico-sans-dt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/sentico-sans-dt/")

Coupe:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/coupe/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/coupe/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/coupe/") [double story |g| only]

Soleto:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/soleto/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/soleto/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/soleto/")

Klint:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/Klint%20Rounded/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Klint%20Rounded/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/Klint%20Rounded/fonts/") [double story |g| only]

Gustan:  
 [http://vllg.com/luxtypo/gustan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/vllg.com/luxtypo/gustan "http://vllg.com/luxtypo/gustan")

Great Escape:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/great-escape-rg/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419204056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/great-escape-rg/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/great-escape-rg/")
